description.p: Get the difference in months between two dates.

prototypes.prototype: MonthsBetweenDates as N (Date1 as D, Date2 as D)

description.p: Returns the difference in months between two dates

discussion.p: The MonthsBetweenDates function calculates the difference in months between two dates

example.caption: MonthsBetweenDates() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 OrderDate, ShippedDate, MonthsBetweenDates(OrderDate, ShippedDate) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =08/16/1994 12:00:00 00 am|10/16/1994 12:00:00 00 am|2
